description: Amendments to planning permission dated 22nd August 2024 (RN:24/02152/FULL) for Alterations and extensions including the erection of an additional storey at roof level with a terrace, lift overrun and plant enclosure, extensions at rear second to sixth floor level, alterations to Apple Yard Elevation treatment including addition of balconies and terraces, new façade treatment onto Jermyn Street Elevation, front terraces at fifth and sixth floor, partial excavation at lower ground level, all in association with the provision of additional Class E floorspace. Namely, minor alterations to fenestration detailing on front façade, relocation of three MWHR air intake louvres from the east elevation to the flank wall on the rear elevation, provision of new metal balustrade at the third floor east elevation, update to core arrangement throughout the building, increase in sedum roof area at roof level, amendments to riser arrangement from the first to seventh floor and extended second route of escape to roof terrace vis sliding AOV from seventh floor.
